name: Sarcophagus Slime
movement: 20 feet speed with ability to move through narrow spaces
description: The Sarcophagus Slime is a menacing blob-like creature with a dark and slimy appearance, able to move effortlessly through narrow spaces. Its presence radiates a threat to those nearby.
memorable: It can drain the life force of its victims and possibly resurrect them as a Sarcophagus Slime.
goals: To instill fear and weaken its enemies' vitality.
relations: Could be found with other undead creatures or in tombs and crypts.
environment: Typically found in dark, necrotic environments like burial sites or ruins.
strengths: High hit points and the ability to inflict fear and necrotic damage.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack feature combining fear-inducing presence and damaging slam attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Corrupting Gaze, which inflicts necrotic damage and reduces the target's hit point maximum.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, making it effective at ambush tactics.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep
Can frighten creatures to control the battlefield
Damage from Corrupting Gaze has lasting effects on victims
Resurrects slain humanoids as Sarcophagus Slimes after 24 hours
test_queries: creature that instills fear and reduces health
undead slime that can resurrect slain foes
creature that can move through narrow spaces easily
